OpenVz vs Kvm Which VPS Virtualization is Best for You?
This is common question for all of us which virtualization is actually work faster, KVM or OpenVZ?” In our point of view its fully depends of your site traffic and overall traffic load. Once you have compared RAM and Cores Kvm have fully Dedicated Core and RAM its actually called Mini Dedicated Server. OpenVZ is easier to set-up and maintain properly, while KVM takes much more networking knowledge. KVM is generally more stable than OpenVZ.
